# ADDENDUM TO THE PAYMENT MANAGEMENT SERVICES AGREEMENT NO 0907-25

This **ADDENDUM TO THE PAYMENT MANAGEMENT SERVICES AGREEMENT NO 0907-25** of 9th July 2025 is entered into as of 14th of July, 2025 (the "Effective Date") by and between:

**NUOPLAYM LIMITED,** a legal entity duly established and acting under the laws of the United Kingdom, with the registered number 15858142 and registered address is 167-169 Great Portland Street, London, England, W1W 5PF, represented by the **Director ILONA VASILJEVA**, acted on the basis of the Article of Association (hereinafter referred to as the "Merchant"), and

**SMARTFLOW PAYMENTS LIMITED**, a legal entity duly established and acting under the laws of England and Wales with the registered number 11070048, registered office is at: Office 39.18 Level39 One Canada Square, London, England, E14 5AB, represented by the **Director Anastasiia Pervushyna** acted on the basis of the Article of Association (hereinafter referred to as the "Company")

The Merchant and the Company are hereinafter sometimes referred to individually as the "Party" and together collectively as the "Parties".

**WHEREAS** the Parties have previously entered into a Payment Management Services Agreement (the "Original Agreement") dated 9th July 2025;

**WHEREAS** the Parties wish to amend the Original Agreement to include specific terms related to payment initiation services, detailed obligations, and termination provisions;

**NOW, THEREFORE,** in consideration of the mutual promises contained herein, the Parties agree as follows:

---

## 1. AMENDMENT TO SERVICES

The Company shall now provide Payment Initiation Services (PIS) in addition to the existing services outlined in the ADDENDUM dated 14th of July, 2025 TO THE PAYMENT MANAGEMENT SERVICES AGREEMENT NO 0907-25 dated 9th July 2025.

This service will enable the Merchant to initiate payments directly for card payouts.

---

## 2. DESCRIPTION OF SERVICES

Payment Initiation Services shall include, but not be limited to:

- Enabling the Merchant to authorise payouts to card to their customers.
- Processing these payment instructions in real-time.
- Providing the Merchant with access to detailed transaction information and payment statuses.

---

## 3. FEE STRUCTURE

The Company Fee for Payment Initiation Services shall be set as detailed in the Terms of Business Agreement.

---

## 4. RIGHTS AND OBLIGATIONS

### 4.1 Company Obligations

The Company shall ensure the secure processing of payment initiation services and comply with applicable regulations for payment services.

### 4.2 Merchant Obligations

#### 4.2.1
The Merchant agrees to integrate the Payment Initiation Services as per the technical requirements provided by the Company and to comply with all regulatory and security protocols associated with the use of these services.

#### 4.2.2
The Merchant shall remain liable for all the CDD/EDD applicable in relation to the Client initiating a transaction.

---

## 5. INCORPORATION OF TERMS

Except as amended by this Addendum, all terms and conditions of the Original Agreement shall remain in full force and effect.

---

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Parties have executed this Addendum as of the date first above written.

---

## SIGNATURES AND DETAILS OF THE PARTIES

| **"MERCHANT"** | **"COMPANY"** |
|----------------|---------------|
| By: **NUOPLAYM LIMITED** | By: **SMARTFLOW PAYMENTS LIMITED** |
| Name: **ILONA VASILJEVA** | Name: **Anastasiia Pervushyna** |
| Title: Director | Title: Director |
| Signature: _________________ | Signature: _________________ |

---

The Company and the Merchant hereby agree that the following updated terms and conditions, and those set forth in Terms of Business Agreement attached hereto, shall be binding upon the Parties.
